attributes.action: work harder with other governments towards cancelling 3rd world debt, with much higher aspirations than the landmark, yet nowhere near big enough reduction from the G8 summit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The basics are(a search engine will teach you more), the world governments are doing nowhere near enough to help reduce these massive unneccesary and unrealistic debts, which were largely created by faults of western governments in some way or another(ie. empowering dictators and terror regimes with our own political aspirations, or simply being unrealistic and lending with no thought to moral consequences)
